titles.title: Opportunities to Support Mothers and Deliver Children Act
Opportunities to Support Mothers and Deliver Children Act

To provide grants for the conduct of demonstration projects designed to provide education and training for eligible individuals to enter and follow a career pathway in the field of pregnancy, childbirth, or postpartum, under the Health Profession Opportunity Grant Program under section 2008 of the Social Security Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
